profile.name: Rick Spence
profile.title: PROGRAM/PROJECT MANAGER
profile.description: Rick Spence is a highly accomplished and results-oriented Program/Project Manager with extensive experience in leading and delivering complex projects and programs within the Australian Defence Force and various government agencies.  His expertise spans end-to-end project management, risk mitigation, milestone achievement, and resource coordination.  A highly organized and detail-oriented leader, Rick possesses exceptional communication and negotiation skills, effectively collaborating with internal teams, vendors, and stakeholders to ensure project success.  His proven ability to manage multiple teams, mentor junior staff, and implement Agile methodologies (SAFe 6.0) demonstrates his leadership capabilities and commitment to delivering high-quality results.  Rick's ambition and career focus align perfectly with opportunities to contribute to organizational goals and further develop his skills within a challenging and rewarding environment.
profile.description2: With a strong background in digital transformation, cloud computing (Microsoft Azure, AWS), and cyber security, Rick consistently delivers impactful results.  His experience includes managing projects with budgets reaching billions of dollars, implementing SAFe frameworks, and optimizing DevOps environments.  He has a proven track record of successfully navigating complex stakeholder relationships, resolving project challenges, and exceeding expectations.  Rick's expertise in Agile coaching, Scrum mastering, and Jira administration, coupled with his proficiency in various project management methodologies (PRINCE2, PMP, MSP), makes him a highly valuable asset to any organization seeking a skilled and experienced program/project manager.  He is adept at building high-performing teams, fostering collaboration, and driving continuous improvement.  His commitment to professional development is evident through his numerous certifications and memberships in relevant professional organizations.
